name: "Teeving" Up
description:
Teeving Up is a little video game made for the WowieJam 2022. The theme was "Collaborate with the AI". Made by Slinon and GoragarX.

Follow us on Twitter!

https://twitter.com/GoragarXGameDev
https://twitter.com/Slinon

Changelog

[v1.0] WowieJam 4.0 version.

MAINGame released.

[v1.1] Community Feedback Update.

TEEVISpeed increased.
Jump adjusted (faster and slightly higher).
Hitbox adjusted.KITTENSpeed increased.
Jump adjusted (faster and less floaty).
Picking up object radius increased.SPRINGSHitbox drastically reduced (easier to pick up).
[NEW] a "Pick up" message appears when the player is in range of picking up the spring.LEVELSLevel 3 layout changed.MISCELLANEOUSCamera now follows the target smoothly.
[NEW] Camera will point to a different target by pressing LShift.
Particles added.
Post-processing added.
Victory screen changed.
Level selector addedBUGFIXESFixed a bug where TEEVI would get stuck if landed on a ledge.
